name.vi: Công cụ tìm quà tặng tốt nhất

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the estimated price when you want to buy gifts
short.vi: Tính giá ước tính khi muốn mua các món quà tặng

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Best Gifts Finder app on Chrome Extension! This application helps you easily search and buy shirts with a quick price calculation feature based on the quantity you want to buy. You'll also discover popular fashion shirts like Diablo Pride, Ariel Red Christmas, Black Cat, and Baby Yoda, providing detailed information on colors, materials, and sizes.

Salient features:

Quick and convenient price calculation: With the quick price calculation feature, you can easily estimate the total cost based on the number of shirts you want to buy. Just enter the quantity in the corresponding box, the application will automatically calculate the estimated total price, helping you manage your gift shopping budget effectively.

Show off trendy shirts: The Best Gifts Finder app on Chrome Extension shows a list of trending shirts, including Diablo Pride, Ariel Red Christmas, Black Cat, and Baby Yoda. You have the flexibility to choose a shirt that suits the gift recipient's style and preferences.

Detailed information: For each shirt, you will have detailed information about color, material and size. This helps you choose the right gift and ensures the recipient's satisfaction.

How to install and use:

Setting:

Open Google Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "Best Gifts Finder" in the search box.
Select the "Best Gifts Finder" widget and press the "Install" button.

Use:
Click the icon to open the utility.
To calculate the price of the shirt, enter the quantity you want to buy in the corresponding box and the app will display the estimated total price.

With the Best Gifts Finder app on Chrome Extension, you will easily find the perfect gift for every anniversary and holiday. Install the app and start gift shopping with ease!

Contact for application comments at:
- Email: support@bestgiftsfinder.com
- Phone: +1 (708) 966 9944
- Address 1: 8510 S Cottage Grove Ave, Chicago, IL 60619, USA
